meanings.definition: To rotate or cause to rotate automatically.
meanings.sent1: The helicopter autorotated smoothly to the ground.
meanings.sent2: The windmill autorotated in the breeze.
meanings.sent3: The toy car autorotated around the room, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts autorotated in her mind, never settling on one idea.
meanings.sent5: The colorful pinwheel autorotated, catching the sunlight and spinning beautifully.

meanings.definition: The act of rotating or causing to rotate automatically.
meanings.sent1: The autorotation of the propeller kept the engine running smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The autorotated camera captured stunning aerial footage.
meanings.sent3: The autorotated display at the science fair caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent4: His life felt like an autorotation, constantly in motion without his control.
meanings.sent5: The autorotated sculpture in the park was a mesmerizing sight for visitors.
